name: The File Game
description:
Welcome the File Game, a 10 minute gimmick game that uses the Windows File Explorer as it's display.

This game was created for a video on my channel "DHMelon".

Battle and talk your way through the determination folder and enjoy!

IMPORTANT: To proceed to the next dialog, you have to close the notepad instance created by the program.  IMPORTANT2: If some keys don't work, try holding them instead of pressing!
